name: The Snowboard Game
description: The snowboard game is a realistic skill based snowboard game with natural physics set in multiple immersive mountain locations and snow parks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
